name: Rosewood Staff [Pulsating]
data: It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution adequately.
It increases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
staff can create a thorny wall around the caster.
